missionSuccessStatementOverride: That was a tough fight - good job, Commander.
goodFaithStatementOverride: Commander - you did your best but it was not enough.... I have people to evacuate - our contract is terminated.
badFaithStatementOverride: Did you TRY to fight the bandits!? Bah! I have people to evacuate - our contract is terminated.
shortDescription:
We have detected an inbound Morenci force heading towards the base. Reroute your patrol lance to an intercept course and deal with intruders.

Good luck out there, mercenary.
longDescription: Commander, Argo sensors are detecting large number of mech signatures down there, maybe even assault class 'Mechs.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Morenci Forces
contractObjectiveList.description: Eliminate Morenci Gang force before they reach the Norilsk-11 mine

dialogueContent.words: Sensors indicate 'Mech signatures directly in front of you, Commander.
Readings from Argo indicate that this is a small scout element that is preceding the main force.
Given that this is going to be a high-intensity battle, choose your targets carefully.
<color=#FF7F7F>Outrider group is not responding, Boss - I think they are all flatlined...</color>
<color=#FF7F7F>It matters not. We know where the merc lance is. Just look out of your cockpit...</color>
Good fight, Commander. No more enemy signatures out there...Return to the Norilsk-11 mine.
The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} raiders are going to run roughshod over the Norilsk-11 mine.
Vanguard of the Morenci main force detected. This is it, Commander...
